summary: Completed comprehensive testing of P0 (Job Cards), P1 (PDI/Artifacts), and P2 (Stats) fixes. All three priority issues are RESOLVED. Applied 1 minor fix for vehicle registration display.
passed_tests: P0: Job Cards page loads correctly at /app/job-cards
P0: Stats show correct counts - Total Jobs (4), Active Jobs (3), Awaiting Approval (0), In PDI (0)
P0: Job Cards table displays all 4 job cards with proper data
P0: Vehicle registration numbers now display correctly (fixed N/A issue)
P0: New Job Card button opens modal with all required fields
P1: Artifacts/PDI page loads at /app/pdi with 5 artifact cards
P1: PDI Checklist Generator card opens modal correctly
P1: PDI modal has Vehicle Registration and Technician Name inputs
P1: PDI modal has 10 checklist items with Pass/Fail/Photo buttons
P1: Pass/Fail buttons work correctly and update item status
P1: Progress bar updates correctly (shows X/10 items checked)
P2: Backend /api/job-cards/stats returns correct format with all fields
P2: Stats values are numeric and active = pending + in_progress
P2: by_status breakdown includes CUSTOMER_APPROVAL, PDI, PDI_COMPLETED, etc.
Backend: 18/18 API tests passed (health, stats, CRUD, dashboard, invoices, MG contracts)
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: JobCardTable.tsx was checking only 'registration_number' but backend returns 'vehicle_registration'. Added fallback to check both fields.
seed_data_creation: Test job cards created during pytest run were cleaned up automatically
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 priority issues (P0: Job Cards blank, P1: PDI not interactive, P2: Stats incorrect) are RESOLVED. Backend APIs are fully functional. Frontend pages /app/job-cards and /app/pdi work correctly. Vehicle registration fix applied to JobCardTable.tsx to handle field name mismatch between backend (vehicle_registration) and frontend types (registration_number).

P0_job_cards.stats_displayed: Total Jobs: 4, Active Jobs: 3, Awaiting Approval: 0, In PDI: 0

P1_pdi_artifacts.pdi_modal: Working with all inputs and Pass/Fail buttons

P2_stats.response_format: Correct with total, pending, in_progress, completed, cancelled, active, by_status
